channel.title: HELP with NPC Dialogue!
channel.description:
I have an allstar-scape base and no matter what tutorial I follow, I can't talk to any of my NPCs. Can anyone tell me how [i]with[/i] Allstar-Scape please?! Thank you.
TheCyberMan
EDIT: MOD PLEASE REMOVE, I FIGURED OUT PROBLEM.

item.title: HELP with NPC Dialogue!
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

I’ve done that and all the other codings, but it still doesn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP with NPC Dialogue!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Example off allstar;

     case 1339: /* Hans*/
            sendFrame200(4883, 591);
            sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
            sendFrame126("Welcome To Mod Allstarscape !!", 4885);
            sendFrame126("Click here to Get shot by Hans", 4886);
            sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
            sendFrame164(4882);
            NpcDialogueSend = true;
            break;

Read full topic
